ValidationRule.description: If Opportunity Stage is not equal to Closed Lost or On Hold or Proposal Approved/Closed Won & Quote Status field = Received, and Premium field is less than 10k then we can check “Show in APEX” to present the quote to the client in APEX
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Scale_Received', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Scale_Locked', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Scale_Open',
((ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.StageName ,'Closed Lost') || ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.StageName ,'Proposal Approved/Closed Won') || ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.StageName ,'On Hold') || ISPICKVAL(Status__c,'Received')) && Premium__c > 10000))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If Opportunity Stage is not equal to Closed Lost or On Hold or Proposal Approved/Closed Won & Quote Status field = Received, and Premium field is less than 10k then we can check “Show in APEX” to present the quote to the client in APEX
